title: Chick with a Charm
description: View our feature on Vicki Lewis Thompsonâ€™s Chick with a Charm.From the New York Times bestselling author of Blonde with a Wand--another charming tale of love and witchcraft   Lily Revere is free-spirited and fun-loving-two dangerous qualities in a witch. Lily needs a date for her sister Anica's engagement party, and she's determined to bring hot Griffin Taylor. But the jaded divorce lawyer claims his job has warned him off romance. Slipping a love elixir into Griffin's drink may not be the noble thing to do-but it sure works! There's just one problem: Are Griffin's feelings the result of some truly good witchcraft-or could he really be in love?
author: Vicki Lewis Thompson
